extension.name: CiviRAG - CiviCRM RAG Integration
extension.description: Retrieval-Augmented Generation integration for CiviCRM. Enables AI-powered natural language search across your CiviCRM data using external RAG backend services. Search contacts, activities, cases, and more using plain English queries.
extension.comments: AI-powered search extension that integrates with external RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) services to enable natural language queries across CiviCRM data. Features real-time synchronization, queue-based processing, and comprehensive search capabilities
